nodes.text: Mark Waid (born March 21, 1962) is an American comic-book author who wrote the 2015 Star Wars: Princess Leia limited series for Marvel Comics. He has written numerous critically acclaimed comic books for DC, Marvel and Boom! Studios, including Kingdom Come, Superman: Birthright, Fantastic Four Vol 2, Daredevil Vol 3 and 4, and Captain America: Man Out of Time.
